description: (LBG) Limited by Guarantee for the universal restoring of nations. This token is a lawful remedy, tasked at force, to deploy probes into illicit blockchain finance. It stands alone as the only Basel-4 compliant token in the world. TURON is divine judgement that Shall go forth lifting the veil from thine eyes. Memorandum to all LLCs 501 C3s... UCc1-201 UCc1-103 UCc1-207 UCc1-308 the great seal Perseverando all liberties reserved.
